channel.title: macos on Petro Ladkin
channel.description: Recent content in macos on Petro Ladkin

item.title: Code generator from OMG IDL
item.description: Development description Designed and developed the generator tool based on the customerâ€™s requirements Developed Flex and Bison rules to generate AST (Abstract syntax tree) from OMG IDL syntax Designed and developed the base code for serialization/deserialization data for the next languages: C, C++, C#, Python Developed writers for next languages: C, C++, C#, Python, FlatBuffer, Protobuf Developed unit tests for Flex/Bison rules, serialization/deserialization codes, and generated codes from examples Created detailed documentation

item.title: KeyReel macOS
item.description: Development description Participated in the development of the main idea of the product, UX, architecture, planning, bootstrap build, and release system and was responsible for the architecture and protocol design Work with customers, fast working round, bug investigation, fix and deployment Designed and developed MVP of future KeyReel project with macOS communication service With the team under my leadership developed the main version of the product: Developed bidirectional communication framework for Bluetooth using Thrift, and implemented reliable implementation for macOS Designed and developed KeyReel macOS Application App description

item.title: U2F kernel driver
item.description: Development description Designed and developed macOS U2F kernel driver App description U2F kernel driver is used to support the U2F protocol in KeyReel
